name: cypress-automation-cadencerx
description: Cypress Cucumber Automation framework for Cadence Rx
author: Latunji Asgill <lasgill@cadencerx.com>

scripts.contact-us-feature: cypress run --browser chrome --spec 'cypress/e2e/**/Contact_Us.feature' || npm run posttest
scripts.contact-us-tag: cypress run -e TAGS="@contact-us" --browser chrome || npm run posttest
scripts.login-tag: cypress run -e TAGS="@login" --browser chrome || npm run posttest
scripts.login-pass: cypress run -e TAGS="@login" --browser chrome; npm run posttest
scripts.login-and-smoke-tags: cypress run -e TAGS="@login or @smoke" --browser chrome || npm run posttest
scripts.smoke-tag: cypress run -e TAGS="@smoke" --browser chrome || npm run posttest
scripts.regression-tag: cypress run -e TAGS="@regression and not @smoke" --browser chrome
scripts.regression-report: npm run full-regression || npm run posttest
